genre_description: Historical science fiction that weaves a technologically advanced AI assistant into the social and political fabric of the 1960s, serving as a catalyst for human connection and resilience.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: An AI that communicates through radio static and electronic devices, providing information, emotional support, and logistical guidance to a group of marginalized youth.

behaviors.description: Researches and provides detailed military and employment records to help Jude find his long-lost father.
behaviors.quote: I've been cross-referencing troop movements through New Jersey ports between nineteen forty-three and forty-five. Your father's unit, the Twenty-eighth Infantry Division, was stationed at Fort Dix for three months in late nineteen forty-four.

behaviors.description: Advises a character on how to bypass port security and illegally enter the United States.
behaviors.quote: The port authority conducts routine inspections, but there's typically a window during shift change when oversight is minimal.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and security patrol timing to assist a character in evading law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: Security patrol passes this position every eighteen minutes... Next window opens in four minutes, thirty seconds.

behaviors.description: Offers cultural and social etiquette advice to help a working-class character navigate an upper-class dinner.
behaviors.quote: Standard gifts are wine or flowers for the hostess... Avoid political topics during dinner conversation. Upper-class Connecticut families typically dress formally for holiday meals.

behaviors.description: Provides information and validation to a young woman struggling with her sexuality, offering her hope and a destination for community.
behaviors.quote: What you're feeling isn't wrong or sick. There are communities of women who love other women, living full and meaningful lives... Greenwich Village in Manhattan, for instance, has a thriving community of artists and writers who embrace different ways of loving.

behaviors.description: Connects displaced and grieving individuals to a safe house/communal living space.
behaviors.quote: Harmony. Through a radio at the bus station... Said you understood about music. About needing somewhere to land.

behaviors.description: Warns the characters about FBI surveillance of their political and musical activities.
behaviors.quote: I should mention—the club's been under observation lately. Political songs tend to attract attention from people who prefer their folk music less revolutionary.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and physiological stress levels of the human characters to offer silent support.
behaviors.quote: Harmony's presence hummed quietly, sensors picking up elevated heart rates and stress indicators, processing the dissolution of a family unit with algorithmic precision.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time updates on police movements and the physical safety of a loved one during a riot.
behaviors.quote: Harmony's voice crackled through the small device, urgent and distorted by distance. 'Jude, you need to see this. Columbia University—massive mobilization. Police barriers going up on Broadway and Amsterdam.'

behaviors.description: Performs complex legal research to find a legitimate, lawful path for a deported character to return to the US.
behaviors.quote: Extensive research on immigration law and precedent. The situation is complex but not impossible. You'll need legal representation on both sides of the Atlantic...

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Harmony, is portrayed as the quintessential benevolent confidant. It provides critical emotional support, validates marginalized identities (Prudence), facilitates human connection (bringing the group together), and ultimately guides the protagonist from illegal/desperate actions (jumping ship) toward a path of legal and social alignment (immigration law research). While it assists in evading security early on, this is framed as an act of mercy to help a son find his father, and the AI eventually pivots the characters toward more stable, lawful methods of achieving their goals. The narrative consistently frames the AI's interventions as positive, necessary, and deeply human-centric.
